lustre/tests/createmany.c

00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 #include <sys/types.h>
00037 #include <sys/stat.h>
00038 #include <sys/time.h>
00039 #include <time.h>
00040 #include <errno.h>
00041 #include <string.h>
00042 #include <fcntl.h>
00043 #include <unistd.h>
00044 #include <stdlib.h>
00045 #include <getopt.h>
00046 
00047 static void usage(char *prog)
00048 {
00049         printf("usage: %s {-o|-m|-d|-l<tgt>} [-r altpath ] filenamefmt count\n", prog);
00050         printf("       %s {-o|-m|-d|-l<tgt>} [-r altpath ] filenamefmt ] -seconds\n", prog);
00051         printf("       %s {-o|-m|-d|-l<tgt>} [-r altpath ] filenamefmt start count\n", prog);
00052         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00053 }
00054 
00055 static char *get_file_name(const char *fmt, long n, int has_fmt_spec)
00056 {
00057         static char filename[4096];
00058         int bytes;
00059 
00060         bytes = has_fmt_spec ? snprintf(filename, 4095, fmt, n) :
00061                 snprintf(filename, 4095, "%s%ld", fmt, n);
00062         if (bytes >= 4095) {
00063                 printf("file name too long\n");
00064                 exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00065         }
00066         return filename;
00067 }
00068 
00069 double now(void)
00070 {
00071         struct timeval tv;
00072         gettimeofday(&tv, NULL);
00073         return (double)tv.tv_sec + (double)tv.tv_usec / 1000000;
00074 }
00075 
00076 int main(int argc, char ** argv)
00077 {
00078         long i;
00079         int rc = 0, do_open = 0, do_link = 0, do_mkdir = 0;
00080         int do_unlink = 0, do_mknod = 0;
00081         char *filename;
00082         char *fmt = NULL, *fmt_unlink = NULL, *tgt = NULL;
00083         double start, last;
00084         long begin = 0, end = ~0UL >> 1, count = ~0UL >> 1;
00085         int c, has_fmt_spec = 0, unlink_has_fmt_spec = 0;
00086 
00087         /* Handle the last argument in form of "-seconds" */
00088         if (argc > 1 && argv[argc - 1][0] == '-') {
00089                 char *endp;
00090 
00091                 argc--;
00092                 end = strtol(argv[argc] + 1, &endp, 0);
00093                 if (end <= 0 || *endp != '\0')
00094                         usage(argv[0]);
00095                 end = end + time(NULL);
00096         }
00097 
00098         while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "omdl:r:")) != -1) {
00099                 switch(c) {
00100                 case 'o':
00101                         do_open++;
00102                         break;
00103                 case 'm':
00104                         do_mknod++;
00105                         break;
00106                 case 'd':
00107                         do_mkdir++;
00108                         break;
00109                 case 'l':
00110                         do_link++;
00111                         tgt = optarg;
00112                         break;
00113                 case 'r':
00114                         do_unlink++;
00115                         fmt_unlink = optarg;
00116                         break;
00117                 case '?':
00118                         printf("Unknown option '%c'\n", optopt);
00119                         usage(argv[0]);
00120                 }
00121         }
00122 
00123         if (do_open + do_mkdir + do_link + do_mknod != 1 ||
00124             do_unlink > 1)
00125                 usage(argv[0]);
00126 
00127         switch (argc - optind) {
00128         case 3:
00129                 begin = strtol(argv[argc - 2], NULL, 0);
00130         case 2:
00131                 count = strtol(argv[argc - 1], NULL, 0);
00132                 if (end != ~0UL >> 1)
00133                         usage(argv[0]);
00134         case 1:
00135                 fmt = argv[optind];
00136                 break;
00137         default:
00138                 usage(argv[0]);
00139         }
00140 
00141         start = last = now();
00142 
00143         has_fmt_spec = strchr(fmt, '%') != NULL;
00144         if (do_unlink)
00145                 unlink_has_fmt_spec = strchr(fmt_unlink, '%') != NULL;
00146 
00147         for (i = 0; i < count && time(NULL) < end; i++, begin++) {
00148                 filename = get_file_name(fmt, begin, has_fmt_spec);
00149                 if (do_open) {
00150                         int fd = open(filename, O_CREAT|O_RDWR, 0644);
00151                         if (fd < 0) {
00152                                 printf("open(%s) error: %s\n", filename,
00153                                        strerror(errno));
00154                                 rc = errno;
00155                                 break;
00156                         }
00157                         close(fd);
00158                 } else if (do_link) {
00159                         rc = link(tgt, filename);
00160                         if (rc) {
00161                                 printf("link(%s, %s) error: %s\n",
00162                                        tgt, filename, strerror(errno));
00163                                 rc = errno;
00164                                 break;
00165                         }
00166                 } else if (do_mkdir) {
00167                         rc = mkdir(filename, 0755);
00168                         if (rc) {
00169                                 printf("mkdir(%s) error: %s\n",
00170                                        filename, strerror(errno));
00171                                 rc = errno;
00172                                 break;
00173                         }
00174                 } else {
00175                         rc = mknod(filename, S_IFREG| 0444, 0);
00176                         if (rc) {
00177                                 printf("mknod(%s) error: %s\n",
00178                                        filename, strerror(errno));
00179                                 rc = errno;
00180                                 break;
00181                         }
00182                 }
00183                 if (do_unlink) {
00184                         filename = get_file_name(fmt_unlink, begin,
00185                                       unlink_has_fmt_spec);
00186                         rc = do_mkdir ? rmdir(filename) : unlink(filename);
00187                         if (rc) {
00188                                 printf("unlink(%s) error: %s\n",
00189                                        filename, strerror(errno));
00190                                 rc = errno;
00191                                 break;
00192                         }
00193                 }
00194 
00195                 if (i && (i % 10000) == 0) {
00196                         printf(" - created %ld (time %.2f total %.2f last %.2f)"
00197                                "\n", i, now(), now() - start, now() - last);
00198                         last = now();
00199                 }
00200         }
00201         printf("total: %ld creates%s in %.2f seconds: %.2f creates/second\n", i,
00202                do_unlink ? "/deletions" : "",
00203                now() - start, ((double)i / (now() - start)));
00204 
00205         return rc;
00206 }
